channel.title: Court Cam

channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: A man accused of driving with a suspended license gets caught lying to the judge; the grieving partner of a drunk driving victim gets tasered outside the courthouse; a man testifies that his son wasn't assaulting him, and more.

channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: A man who is accused of indecency with a child's doll faces his accuser in court; an arsonist who killed nine people hears it from the judge; a multi-murder suspect misbehaves in the courtroom.
